SUMMARY: "We are limiting headcount additions through a targeted hiring freeze," Disney CEO Bob Chapek said in a memo obtained by CNBC.

TITLE: Mark Kelly wins Arizona Senate race, bringing Democrats one seat away from majority, NBC News projects
SUMMARY: Incumbent Sen. Mark Kelly, who was elected in 2020 to finish the late Sen. John McCain's term, defeated his Republican challenger Blake Masters in Arizona.

TITLE: Washington turns up heat on crypto 'darling' Sam Bankman-Fried following FTX bankruptcy
SUMMARY: The company's implosion has led the Biden White House and two powerful committee chairs to publicly criticize FTX and call for tighter industry oversight.

TITLE: Nio reports strong third-quarter revenue as it gears up for a big year-end production push
SUMMARY: Nio's loss widened significantly from a year ago, but revenue was strong, and the company guided to a big jump in production in the fourth quarter.

TITLE: Disney plans hiring freeze, layoffs and cost cuts, according to a memo from CEO Bob Chapek
SUMMARY: "We are limiting headcount additions through a targeted hiring freeze," Disney CEO Bob Chapek said in a memo obtained by CNBC.

TITLE: From Elon Musk to Sam Bankman-Fried, a bad week for market geniuses, but was it their fault?
SUMMARY: Elon Musk and Sam Bankman-Fried may be geniuses, but once again the governance risks of talented founders and CEOs left unchecked have been laid bare.

TITLE: FTX says it's removing trading and withdrawals, moving digital assets to a cold wallet after a $477 million suspected hack
SUMMARY: New FTX CEO says the bankrupt exchange is "in the process of removing trading and withdrawal functionality" and moving digital assets to cold storage.

TITLE: Democrats will keep control of the Senate, NBC News projects
SUMMARY: Democrats will retain control of the Senate in the 2022 midterm elections, NBC News projected.

TITLE: FTX users appear to be cashing out of bankrupt crypto exchange through a Bahamas loophole
SUMMARY: Some FTX users appear to have found a way to move money off of the exchange through a back door in the Bahamas.

TITLE: Sam Bankman-Fried reportedly denies fleeing to Argentina, says he's still in the Bahamas
SUMMARY: Sam Bankman-Fried told Reuters he is still in the Bahamas, as rumors swirled overnight that the ex-CEO of the now-bankrupt FTX had run off to South America.

TITLE: England beat Pakistan to win T20 World Cup at MCG as Ben Stokes stars yet again in a final
SUMMARY: England first men's side to hold T20 World Cup and 50-over World Cup titles simultaneously as Ben Stokes steers side to five-wicket win over Pakistan.

TITLE: Twitter cuts a large number of contract workers without giving internal teams a heads up
SUMMARY: Since Elon Musk acquired Twitter, the social media business has implemented mass layoffs and now steep cuts to its contract workforce.

TITLE: Sam Bankman-Fried’s Alameda quietly used FTX customer funds without raising alarm bells, say sources
SUMMARY: Sam Bankman-Fried's trading firm was able to quietly use customer funds from his exchange FTX without sounding alarm bells, sources say.

TITLE: India, Mexico and Southeast Asia will benefit from 'the great diversification,' Australia's Kevin Rudd says
SUMMARY: For businesses seeking diversification into new markets, India, Mexico and Southeast Asia are top contenders, former Australian Prime Minister Kevin Rudd said.

TITLE: GOP's lackluster midterms showing puts Trump on defense, days before his 'big announcement'
SUMMARY: After the midterms, Trump has been quick to respond to his perceived enemies in the media and politics — including GOP Gov. Ron DeSantis of Florida.

TITLE: A brain expert shares his 7 'hard rules' for boosting memory and fighting off dementia
SUMMARY: Certain lifestyle factors have a greater impact than your genes do on whether you'll develop memory-related diseases. Brain health scientist and author of "The Age-Proof Brain" Marc Milstein shares the "hard rules" he lives by to strengthen his memory and combat dementia.

TITLE: 'Black Panther: Wakanda Forever' eyes $180 million opening weekend, highest November debut ever
SUMMARY: Disney and Marvel Studios' "Black Panther: Wakanda Forever" snared an estimated $180 million during its domestic debut.

TITLE: The top 10 most-regretted college majors — and the degrees graduates wish they had pursued instead
SUMMARY: Graduates entering the workforce with good career prospects and high starting salaries are the most satisfied with their major, according to ZipRecruiter.

TITLE: SpaceX just bought a big ad campaign on Twitter for Starlink
SUMMARY: Elon Musk's aerospace business SpaceX just ordered one of the larger advertising packages available from Twitter.

TITLE: It may be one of the last countries to let travelers in — and it's not China
SUMMARY: Even if North Korea were open to travelers, they would not be able to visit because the two main ways to enter — Russia and China — are largely closed to them.

TITLE: Alibaba's Cainiao opens LatAm headquarters in Brazil
SUMMARY: The expansion comes as China's retail growth has slowed — Alibaba for the first time didn't release total sales for its Singles' Day shopping festival.

TITLE: The G-20 summit kicks off Tuesday. Here's what to expect.
SUMMARY: The summit begins as the global economy grapples with a looming recession, central banks' jumbo rate hikes and historically high inflation.

TITLE: 'Vaccination-style' intervention needed to solve energy crisis, UK energy boss says
SUMMARY: The average U.K. household faces paying a £2,500 ($2,900) annual bill for the next two years, up from £1,400 in October 2021.

TITLE: Iran issues first known death sentence linked to recent protests
SUMMARY: Jail terms ranging from five to 10 years have been handed down to five other individuals. The rulings are subject to appeal.

TITLE: These currencies have tanked this year — and one is down over 75% against the dollar
SUMMARY: In some emerging markets, a combination of global pressures and central bank missteps has pushed currencies into a death spiral.

TITLE: Crypto peaked a year ago — investors have lost more than $2 trillion since
SUMMARY: In the 12 months since bitcoin peaked at over $68,000, the crypto trade has unwound, sending many coins to zero and hedge funds and lenders into bankruptcy.

TITLE: Biden meets Xi amid heightened China-U.S. tensions
SUMMARY: U.S. President Joe Biden and Chinese President Xi Jinping met Monday for the first time in person since Biden took office.

TITLE: Germany is open to trade with China — but we're not stupid, vice chancellor says
SUMMARY: The comments come after German Chancellor Olaf Scholz made a controversial solo trip to China to meet President Xi Jinping in early November.

TITLE: 'Black Panther: Wakanda Forever' scores $180 million opening weekend, highest November debut ever
SUMMARY: Disney and Marvel Studios' "Black Panther: Wakanda Forever" snared an estimated $180 million during its domestic debut.

TITLE: Russia denies Lavrov was taken to Bali hospital and treated for heart condition ahead of G20 summit
SUMMARY: Russia denied a report that Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov was taken to hospital after he arrived in Bali for the G-20 meeting this week.

TITLE: Russia denies Lavrov was taken to Bali hospital and treated for heart condition ahead of G-20 summit
SUMMARY: Russia denied a report that Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov was taken to hospital after he arrived in Bali for the G-20 meeting this week.

TITLE: Sam Bankman-Fried’s Alameda quietly used FTX customer funds for trading, say sources
SUMMARY: Sam Bankman-Fried's trading firm was able to quietly use customer funds from his exchange FTX without sounding alarm bells, sources say.
